name: Brothers In Arms (Lasenist)
description:
Gather your Brothers in Arms and head deeper into the temple! Carry eachother to victory, calling out commands and throwing yourself into new locations. Gather up enough brothers to weigh down the buttons, and push ahead!

Controls
  • A / D = Move left and Right
  • Space = Jump
  • W / S = Choose which Brother to control in a stack.
  • Shift = Stop stacking with Brothers.
  • Shift + Space = Separate from a stack of Brothers.
  • R = Reset
  • 0 / Q = Call out "Stop!" to your Brothers
  • 1 / E = Call out "Follow me" to your Brothers.

Made in 48 Hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam with the prompt "Joined Together". Very happy with how this turned out, and I think the idea could be explored a little more with some additional features and extra polish!

If you did, thank you for playing my game!

Tools used:

  • Godot
  • Aseprite
  • Audacity
